title: Trouble with the PBE
body: I have been trying to become a PBE tester as of late, however when I try to join via the NA link [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top), it says that there has been an error and that the league site could not load the page. If I'm missing something then please tell me, I've enjoyed playing League for many years and I want to help make it better.

replies.body: Yeah, there appears to be a recent issue preventing players from signing up to the PBE.  I don't have any ETA right now on a fix or more information than that, but it's being looked into.  Hang tight!
Thank you for the update. Please be sure to shoot me a message when it gets fixed
